title: Total Dividend Payments to Individuals for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1919-1941 (2)--Original Data, 1939-1945 (3)--Seasonally Adjusted Data, 1946-1965. Data Has Been Multiplied By 12 To Give Billions Of Dollars At An Annual Rate. Source: Survey Of Current Business, August 1965.

This NBER data series m08238c appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08238c
